quotes.quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Sculpture is the best comment that a painter can make on painting.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is no forgiveness in nature.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
quotes.author: Epicurus
